# The `IncIntegerState` Struct Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Specialization of the integer state for an increasing value, hence ~0u is the best state and 0 the worst. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>template &lt;typename base&#95;ty = uint32&#95;t, base&#95;ty BestState = ~base&#95;ty(0), base&#95;ty WorstState = 0&gt;
struct llvm::IncIntegerState&lt;base&#95;ty, BestState, WorstState&gt;</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Specialization of the integer state for an increasing value, hence ~0u is the best state and 0 the worst.

Definition at line 2815 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/attributor-h">Attributor.h</a>.
